dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, have you seen the news about the upcoming Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum? It's the 6th edition, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, have you seen the news about the upcoming Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum? It's the sixth edition, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, A! I did, actually. It's happening as part of Kazakhstan Energy Week, right? And, um, it sounds like a pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, A! I did, actually. It's happening as part of Kazakhstan Energy Week, right? And, um, it sounds like a pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. I mean, it's in partnership with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy. And...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. I mean, it's in partnership with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy. And...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which means, like, a huge delegation. Daniyar Tiyesov, Denis Kozyrev, Askar Turisbekov... all the big names are gonna be there. Plus refinery reps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which means, like, a huge delegation. Daniyar Tiyesov, Denis Kozyrev, Askar Turisbekov... all the big names are gonna be there. Plus refinery reps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes Deputy Chairman of the Board for the oil refining and marketing Daniyar Tiyesov, Deputy Chairman of the Board of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries Denis Kozyrev, First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products Askar Turisbekov, as well as senior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like 15 senior reps in total, from KazMunayGas even. Speaking of KMG, did you catch the London Stock Exchange news? $2.75 billion Eurobonds!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like fifteen senior reps in total, from KazMunayGas even. Speaking of K M G, did you catch the London Stock Exchange news? two point seven five billion dollars Eurobonds!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All in all the delegation will consist of 15 senior representatives including the heads and managers from the Modernization and Perspective Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national oil company. London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's huge! I mean, uh, largest corporate bond issuance from the CIS region since 2014, if I remember correctly. That's some serious money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's huge! I mean, uh, largest corporate bond issuance from the C I S region since twenty fourteen, if I remember correctly. That's some serious money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It is! And, you know, they're not just raising capital. They're also planning this whole new oil refinery in West Kazakhstan, near Algabas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! And, you know, they're not just raising capital. They're also planning this whole new oil refinery in West Kazakhstan, near Algabas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, the $420 million project! That's, like, a significant investment in their infrastructure, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, the four hundred twenty million dollars project! That's, like, a significant investment in their infrastructure, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total cost of this project is estimated at $420 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. But, um, it's not just Kazakhstan making big moves. The forum's also focusing on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. But, um, it's not just Kazakhstan making big moves. The forum's also focusing on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, those countries are really active in downstream right now. Turkmenistan just launched that gas-to-gasoline plant, pumping out, like, 15.5 thousand barrels a day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, those countries are really active in downstream right now. Turkmenistan just launched that gas-to-gasoline plant, pumping out, like, fifteen point five thousand barrels a day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And they're actively modernizing their refineries too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And they're actively modernizing their refineries too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Uzbekistan! They've got this massive $30.4 billion program underway, aiming to boost advanced refined products for export. Like, really ambitious stuff, from 2016 to 2020.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Uzbekistan! They've got this massive thirty point four billion dollars program underway, aiming to boost advanced refined products for export. Like, really ambitious stuff, from twenty sixteen to twenty twenty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, a lot to discuss at this forum then, it seems. A real hub for regional energy developments, uh, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a lot to discuss at this forum then, it seems. A real hub for regional energy developments, uh, for sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And, um, for any Forbes Kazakhstan readers listening, there's a 10% discount on delegate fees. Just use FORBES10 when you register.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And, um, for any Forbes Kazakhstan readers listening, there's a ten percent discount on delegate fees. Just use F O R B E S ten when you register.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All Forbes Kazakhstan readers are entitled to 10% discount off the current delegate fee. Simply apply FORBES10 promo code when registering online.

dialogue_turns.text: Nice! We should probably link to that event page for more info.
